definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Lots of Libra people are artistic and appreciate beautiful things.
sentences.chinese: 许多天平座人都很有艺术细胞而和审美眼光。

sentences.english: To her aesthetic vision, we can boast about.
sentences.chinese: 对于她的审美眼光，我们可不敢恭维。

sentences.english: She has good taste in clothes.
sentences.chinese: 她对服装有的审美眼光。

sentences.english: You have an eye for beauty.
That sounds like a good idea. You have a good eye for beautiful things.
sentences.chinese: 似乎是个好主意，你的审美眼光不错。

sentences.english: Aesthetic taste and the level of technic refrains the handicraftTujia brocade .
sentences.chinese: 审美眼光和技巧的高低制约着织锦工艺水平。

definition: to sample/to taste/to appreciate/one's taste (i.e. in music, literature, fashion, food and drink etc)/good taste
able to withstand careful appreciation/well worth a second look
attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
to like/fond of/to prefer/to love/one's tastes/preference
